sx.blah.discord.api

Interface IDiscordClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscordClientImpl

    public interface IDiscordClient
    Represents the main discord api

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IDiscordClient.Image
      Represents an avatar image.

    • Method Detail

      • getDispatcher

        EventDispatcher getDispatcher()
        Gets the EventDispatcher instance for this client. Use this to handle events.
        Returns:
        The event dispatcher instance.

      • getToken

        String getToken()
        Gets the authorization token for this client.
        Returns:
        The authorization token.

      • login

        void login()
    throws DiscordException
        Logs the client in as the provided account.
        Throws:
        DiscordException - This is thrown if there is an error logging in.

      • logout

        void logout()
     throws HTTP429Exception
        Logs out the client.
        Throws:
        HTTP429Exception

      • changeAccountInfo

        void changeAccountInfo(Optional<String> username,
                       Optional<String> email,
                       Optional<String> password,
                       Optional<IDiscordClient.Image> avatar)
                throws HTTP429Exception
        Allows you to change the info on your bot.
        Parameters:
        username - Username (if you want to change it).
        email - Email (if you want to change it)
        password - Password (if you want to change it).
        avatar - Image data for the bot's avatar, IDiscordClient.Image
        Throws:
        HTTP429Exception

      • updatePresence

        void updatePresence(boolean isIdle,
                    Optional<String> game)
        Updates the bot's presence.
        Parameters:
        isIdle - If true, the bot will be "idle", otherwise the bot will be "online".
        game - The optional name of the game the bot is playing. If empty, the bot simply won't be playing a game.

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()
        Checks if the api is ready to be interacted with (if it is logged in).
        Returns:
        True if ready, false if otherwise.

      • getOurUser

        IUser getOurUser()
        Gets the User this bot is representing.
        Returns:
        The user object.

      • getChannelByID

        IChannel getChannelByID(String channelID)
        Gets a channel by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        channelID - The id of the desired channel.
        Returns:
        The Channel object with the provided id.

      • getVoiceChannelByID

        IVoiceChannel getVoiceChannelByID(String id)
        Gets a voice channel from a given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The voice channel id.
        Returns:
        The voice channel (or null if not found).

      • getGuildByID

        IGuild getGuildByID(String guildID)
        Gets a guild by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        guildID - The id of the desired guild.
        Returns:
        The Guild object with the provided id.

      • getGuilds

        List<IGuild> getGuilds()
        Gets all the guilds the user the api represents is connected to.
        Returns:
        The list of Guilds the api is connected to.

      • getUserByID

        IUser getUserByID(String userID)
        Gets a user by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        userID - The id of the desired user.
        Returns:
        The User object with the provided id.

      • getOrCreatePMChannel

        IPrivateChannel getOrCreatePMChannel(IUser user)
                              throws Exception
        Gets a PrivateChannel for the provided recipient.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who will be the recipient of the private channel.
        Returns:
        The PrivateChannel object.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getInviteForCode

        IInvite getInviteForCode(String code)
        Gets the invite for a code.
        Parameters:
        code - The invite code or xkcd pass.
        Returns:
        The invite, or null if it doesn't exist.

      • getRegions

        List<IRegion> getRegions()
                  throws HTTP429Exception
        Gets the regions available for discord.
        Returns:
        The list of available regions.
        Throws:
        HTTP429Exception

      • getRegionForID

        IRegion getRegionForID(String regionID)
        Gets the corresponding region for a given id.
        Parameters:
        regionID - The region id.
        Returns:
        The region (or null if not found).

      • createGuild

        IGuild createGuild(String name,
                   Optional<String> regionID,
                   Optional<IDiscordClient.Image> icon)
            throws HTTP429Exception
        Creates a new guild.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the guild.
        regionID - The region id for the guild (defaults to us-west).
        icon - The icon for the guild.
        Returns:
        The new guild's id.
        Throws:
        HTTP429Exception
